name: Exposify
author: Exposify

sections.description:
Exposify for WordPress displays all of your real estate objects in an elegant way. Search engine optimized
content and personalized styling make it a must have for all Exposify users!

Visit us at www.exposify.de or send us a mail ðŸ“¬

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1. Download the .zip plugin file
  2. Extract it and put the exposify folder into your plugins directory
  3. In your admin backend visit Exposify in the Settings section
  4. Insert your Exposify credentials and a name and slug for your properties page
  5. Choose a page template of your current theme (e.g. if you want to use a fullwidth template)
  6. Enter a template for the overview of all properties and one for a single property
  7. Insert your CSS code to style the templates from above
  8. Hit Save changes and be happy ðŸŽ‰

Note: We hide the properties page in the pages overview, but you can still access it to add it to your menus.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the .zip plugin file
  2. Extract it and put the exposify folder into your plugins directory
  3. In your admin backend visit Exposify in the Settings section
  4. Insert your Exposify credentials and a name and slug for your properties page
  5. Choose a page template of your current theme (e.g. if you want to use a fullwidth template)
  6. Enter a template for the overview of all properties and one for a single property
  7. Insert your CSS code to style the templates from above
  8. Hit Save changes and be happy ðŸŽ‰

Note: We hide the properties page in the pages overview, but you can still access it to add it to your menus.

What should I enter into the template fields?

If you are a customer of Exposify, we will install and manage the plugin for you. If not, we will leave you here at the moment.

Should I install this plugin by myself?

If you ask – at the moment we discourage you from doing so ðŸ™ƒ But we are in development, so come back later.

What is this all about?

Have a look at our site: www.exposify.de
sections.changelog:
1.11

  • Switch to use SSR

1.10

  • Allow to filter by custom types

1.9

  • Add Exposify SSR support

1.8

  • Add wpSEO support for property description

1.7

  • Use property description as meta tag if YOAST is installed

1.6

  • Update plugin to insert page titles correctly

1.5

  • Change page titles where possible

1.4

  • Send requesting page URL to Exposify

1.3

  • Switch to new API
  • Style fixes

1.2

  • Code refactor
  • Pull HTML templates from Exposify instead from the own site
  • Fixing some small errors

1.1

  • Allow additional style and js sheets

1.0

  • Inital version.
